--- title: "Gherkin testing in .NET" description: "Talk presented at the ilionx DevDays 2023 in Arnhem about using Gherkin to write human-readable tests in dotnet" location: "Van Der Valk, Arnhem" EventDate: 2023-05-12 # include query param ?showNotes=true PresentationUri: https://kaylumah.github.io/ilionx-devdays2023-specflow tags: - testing - specflow - gherkin --- At the 11th edition of the ilionx DevDays in Arnhem, I gave an introductory session on using Gherkin-based testing in .NET with SpecFlow. This talk covered the fundamentals of behavior-driven development (BDD) and showed how SpecFlow enables you to write human-readable tests that double as living documentation. Whether youâ€™re new to BDD or just curious about integrating Gherkin into your .NET workflow, this session provided a practical starting point for writing better, more maintainable tests. - Test descriptiong... Met Specflow maak je het mogelijk om met behulp van dotnet testen te schrijven in de Gherkin taal, door Specflow te gebruiken vergroot je test herbruikbaarheid en creeer je een set aan documentatie voor je applicatie. Deze sessie geeft een introductie in de concepten van specflow.
